title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 446.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 446.2 - Definition

State Regulations

Designated emergency foster family boarding home care
means care provided in a home certified pursuant to Part 443 of this Title and
designated by an authorized agency exclusively for emergency use by children
determined eligible under section
446.6
(d) of this

Part. The purpose of such designation is to provide temporary care and services
to children who enter foster care in a crisis situation which is expected to be
resolved within 60 days so that the children can be reunited with their family. A designated emergency foster family boarding home may also be approved as an
approved respite care and services provider as defined in section
435.2
(b) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
446.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
